m_title: Pushsafer.com - Push-Notifications to iOS, Android and Windows 10 devices
m_descr: Mit Hilfe eines Nutzerkontos und einen Privaten Schlüssel von Pushsafer.com können Benachrichtigungen über Ereignisse im Gateway per Pushsafer versendet werden. Die Push Nachricht kann individuell angepasst werden (Titel, nachricht, Icon, Sound, Vibration, Zielgerät), bitte die API Beschreibung unter https://www.pushsafer.com/en/pushapi beachten
h_dest_device: Device ID or Device Group ID, if a messge shpuld send to a specified device or device group. EMPTY or a = all Devices
h_private_key_token: Private Key from your Pushsafer.com account.
h_iconcolor: Default = empty or a hexadeciaml color code e.g. #FF0000
h_vibration: EMPTY=Device default or a number 1-3 (only iOS & Android)
EMPTY=Device default or a number 1-3 (only iOS & Android)
h_url: optional send an url with the notification
h_time2live: Integer number 0-43200: Time in minutes, after which message automatically gets purged. 0 or empty = do not automatically delete
h_retry: optional number 60-10800: time in seconds, to send the message again
h_expire: optional number 60-10800: time in secondes, to cancel the retry
h_confirm: optional number 10-10800: time in secondes, to send a message again until it is confirmed
h_answer: optional number 1 = Answer possible or 0 = Answer not possible
h_answeroptions: optional specify predefined answer options divided by a pipe character, e.g. Yes|No|Maybe
h_answerforce: optional number 1 = Force an Answer or 0 = do notforce an Answer
